data.title: Theatre Under the Stars
data.meta_description: Based on the hit 2003 film, School of Rock is a high-voltage, feel-good tribute to big dreams, coming together, and the irrepressible power of rock ‘n roll!
data.text:
School of Rock

Volume Up. Curtain Up. Class is in Session.

Kicked out of his band and facing eviction, life isn’t awesome for wannabe rock star Dewey Finn. But his fortunes change when he intercepts a phone call meant for his roommate – and seizes the opportunity to make some quick cash posing as a substitute teacher.

Finding himself in front of a classroom of straight-laced, uptight private school kids, he realizes he has one lesson he can teach them: How to rock! In order to do so, he’s going to have to avoid the prying eyes of the school’s principal and parents.

Based on the hit 2003 film, School of Rock is a high-voltage, feel-good tribute to big dreams, coming together, and the irrepressible power of rock ‘n roll!

“For those about to love School of Rock: We salute you.” – Time Out New York

Featuring pre-show performances from School of Rock Vancouver:

Saturday July 13th

Saturday July 27th (Fireworks Night)

Sunday August 4th

Saturday August 24th (Closing)

CATS

Come One. Come All. It’s Time for the Jellicle Ball.

While the moon shines bright up above, all manner of curious cats and feisty felines creep forth for their annual gathering. Each of the Jellicle Tribe are exceptional and astonishing in their own right – but come the dawn, only one can be selected to ascend to the Heaviside Layer.

One of the longest-running and most beloved musicals in Broadway and West End history, CATS is overflowing with unforgettable songs, including ‘Mr Mistoffelees,’ ‘Macavity: The Mystery Cat,’ and, the all-time favourite, ‘Memory.’

In the natural forest setting of Stanley Park, this open air production breathes fresh new life into the record-breaking musical spectacular and lets the memory live again.

“…unabashed Broadway glitz.” – New York Post
